data.text: Right behind ya! We may not have that materia, but we do have good intel.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: And we can't afford to let it die with us!
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: What the─!? Why can't I hit it!?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Cause that tentacled freak won't let you. We're gonna have to tough this one out.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Boss, the projector! While it's down!
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: What's with this company? They have a "freaks only" policy?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Sonon, help! Get this creep off'a me!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Dunno what this crap is, but it's definitely not good!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Surrender to the darkness. Embrace it.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Ew...I don't want that stuff anywhere near me!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Stay focused. We'll get through this.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: All your suffering will soon be at an end.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Oh, Weiss. This is it. This is it!
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: No darkness! Get it away from me! Get it away!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Let's end this before it swallows us too.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Come closer. Allow me to hasten the inevitable.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Yeah, no. I don't think so.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Just stand back. Your boss has got ya covered!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: It's time I brought this to a close.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: This is impossible. I will not stand for it! I refuse to believe it!!
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: But not for much longer, eh, Boss?
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Right on! They're as good as scrap!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Rather rude to ignore your playmates, is it not?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: This will be quite the show.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You can't beat a good torture session.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Oh, you think you can run?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: No ratholes for you to hide in here.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: So what! Just smash it up!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Not a fan of my handiwork, I take it?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: When will you learn some manners?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Hey! Don't you know that's cheating!?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: A present, from me to you.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You savages are nothing if not resilient.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: More? How many of those things you got?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: So many toys, so little time.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: We can't have you getting bored, now can we?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: The Turks are on top of it.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Yes, there will be no delays.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsider─no, begging.
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000─
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: At least let us issue a warning, sir.
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Whoa, look at all these people...
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Enough to make you sick. Let's get this over with.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Excuse me! I have some questions!
data.speaker: Newspaper Reporter

data.text: You work for Shinra, isn't that right?
data.speaker: Newspaper Reporter

data.text: Then would you care to comment on the rumors that Sector 7 will be the terrorists' next target?
data.speaker: Newspaper Reporter

data.text: They're going to hit the reactor, aren't they?
data.speaker: Newspaper Reporter

data.text: Elevators're right there. Let's catch one.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: But oh, how the mighty are fallen─
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Wutai...colluding with Avalanche and resorting to terrorism?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: I always thought the Wutaians an honorable people. They used to be, certainly...
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: But now? Now they're nothing but blood-sucking flies, buzzing around Shinra's face.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Would you not agree? In light of recent events, I mean.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: I think not. Foreign visitors should take the scenic route.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: ...And savor the opportunity to meet our latest autonomous weapons.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: I'll never get a better chance.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Remember: we're here for a reason.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Don't be. I was ready to strangle her myself.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: And that's before she sent us off in the wrong direction...
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Only one way to find out.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Don't worry, we'll get to Materia Research eventually.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Just a little longer, my precious...
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: The intruders are about to reach the research facility.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: And we'll let them. Meanwhile, find out what it is they want.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You do have eyes, don't you?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Then you can see that, while they are simpletons, they've made it further than any normal Wutaian ever could.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: And they've come such a long way. We simply must roll out the red carpet.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: My trusty steed should provide a fitting welcome, I think.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Cut system power to the research facility.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Bar access to confidential data, then retrace their steps. Find out why they're here.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Above all, do not let them out of your sight.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Aw, c'mon! How could we have gotten so lost!?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Ah, I know. Spare a Da-chao bean?
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: It really helps─knowing I'm not alone in all this.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Think I found our way across!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: It does look more important than the others...
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: This has to be it! Oh, sweet baby, come to mama!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Light. Light! I need more light!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: So─have you found out what they want yet?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: We think so. We can't say for certain, as their behavior is...erratic.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: But they appear to be searching for materia.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: You mean to say that these savages have gone to all this trouble for materia?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: So far as we can tell, yes.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Be that as it may, I suppose I should talk to them.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Awed by a simple hologram? How precious.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: But I know just what you need─to loosen up a little. After such a long journey...
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Luckily, I have toys for that─all far more entertaining than this.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Oh dear. Is that any way to talk to your host?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Really though, as guests, it's more about what you want. And I think you'll find it just up ahead.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Hurry now. Don't keep me waiting.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: That we're walking into a trap, I guess.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: But it's nothing we can't handle, right?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: That thing...can't be operational, can it?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: At long last, Wutai's finest deign to join us.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Quit acting all superior. We both know you're afraid of us!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Is that so? Well, maybe I am!
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You should know there's more where we came from─lots more!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: And you'll never see 'em comin'! Just imagine a whole clan of ninjas landing on your doorstep!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Oh my! We must do something right away!
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Don't say that. Won't you at least give us a chance?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Allow me to present...the latest innovation in Shinra battle armor...
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: This'll be a memory to cherish for the rest of your lives. All thirty seconds of them.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: But I rather suspect you'll wish that I hadn't.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Should've known those actuators weren't up to the task. Time for an overhaul.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: My, my, my, how the tables have turned...
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Weiss? This is a surprise. To what do I owe the pleasure?
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: These idiots want to "digitally replicate" me, so I'm indulging them.
data.speaker: Weiss

data.text: There is no replicating you. They ought to know better.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: I am. It has been too long since my last hunt.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Is this how it's done in Wutai? You just howl until you get what you want?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: That's enough, Sonon. I got this.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Tell us where you're hiding the new materia.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Don't play dumb now. We know you've been cooking up something super-powerful.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Well, well... Wutai must have some highly skilled intelligence operatives.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: That...or we have a mole in our midst.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You are correct that we're in the process of creating an exquisite new materia.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: However, it is far from complete.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Yeah right. You must think I'm stupid.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Regrettable though it is, other plans have been deemed a higher priority.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: My colleagues and I...are going to drop Plate Number 7 on the slums.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: And then we're going to blame it on Avalanche and Wutai.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You're gonna drop a plate? And?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Oh dear. I think your friend might've run into trouble.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Aren't you going to save him?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: There is no ultimate materia─not yet. She said it's still in the works.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: They're gonna drop Plate Number 7 on the slums...apparently.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: But that's the whole upper part of the sector!
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: That's the spirit. Let 'em have it!
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: I'm not goin' down till I've been to the Happy Turtle!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: The rest, I leave to you.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Pain Sensation Level set to: maximum.
data.speaker: Combat Simulator

data.text: They figure we need a challenge.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Meaning we're in for a world of hurt.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: It's time. Initiate the Tsviet field test.
data.speaker: Researcher

data.text: What are you doing? Aren't you all on the same team?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Fool. There are no "teams" in Deepground.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: The place where my brother and I like to play.
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Well, can't blame a girl for trying.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Abnormal readings detected. The control program's been compromised!
data.speaker: Researcher

data.text: How dare you? How dare you stand in my way?
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: It hurts, Brother. It hurts...so much...
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: I must know more of this feeling! Of pain! Of death!
data.speaker: Nero

data.text: Don't wanna spoil the moment, but...
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: That was Scarlet, director of Advanced Weaponry.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: It was one of her machines that killed Melphie!
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Don't think I can do this alone.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Join her team and the sky's the limit!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: We really walking the whole way?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Kalm's still pretty far, though, isn't it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: When my mom says, "a full day," she means from the time you get up in the morning till the time you go to bed...
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: but for me, it means from the time you get up in the morning all the way through till the time you get up the next morning.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: So, which is it for you?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Gotta go with Elmyra on that one.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Bet you've had to hoof it from sunup to sundown tons of times.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This is all just same old, same old, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But even so, we're all gonna need to stop and rest. Especially you.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Anyway, marchin' into the unknown ain't easy, but don't worry, 'cause I'm here to lead the way!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Alright, everyone─let's stop here for a minute. Leader's orders!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now breathe in that fresh air!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When we're not so close to Midgar.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Guess this is good-bye, City of Mako.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What is it with these damn birds!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Where's a roof when you need one?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: That's its way of telling you it's hungry.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just look at this place. Weapons here, weapons there, weapons everywhere!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: They're ready for some serious action.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: It sounds like you are, too.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Duh. Unlike my old man, I'm not some lazy drunk.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: I fight for what I believe in, something he'd never understand.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Behind bars, you mean? Not well, if the government's got anything to say about it.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Good on 'em. Jail's where he belongs.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: That's my master you're talking about. Mind laying off him a little?
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: You know what? Let's drop it. Not exactly my favorite topic.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: It's only gonna make me mad.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: My god, you people are deadly boring.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Luckily, I know exactly how to liven things up...with a little experiment.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Just don't go dying on me─that wouldn't yield very interesting results, now would it?
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text:
Unit calibration complete.
Initiating combat data-collection sequence.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Credit where credit is due. You exceeded my every expectation.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: And for being such good sports...you may now leave.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Why did I ever think for a second she'd be nice to us!? She knows damn well it's gonna be a pain in the ass gettin' up there.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: There we go. Honestly, how do I do it? Now then, Sonon, how ya feel about givin' me a boost?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Hm? Is that materia I smell?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: End of the line, Wutai scum!
data.speaker: Shock Trooper

data.text: This their idea of mood lighting? 'Cause it's bad.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Might be the power. That thing's off too.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Talk about hitting the jackpot! This must be where they make their materia!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Maybe─but they're not what we came for. Let's keep movin', Boss.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Totally. After I grab a few souvenirs.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: System offline. Please activate central terminal.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Access denied. No floors currently accessible.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Oh, not in the mood, huh? Fine! We'll find another way up!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text:
Initiating mako energy saturation.
Deploying security grate.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Wait, is that a security grate or a ladder? Thanks, Shinra!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Huh, that's weird... Not even a whiff of materia up here...
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: But then there's nowhere else to go.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text:
Initiating mako energy saturation.
Deploying security grate.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Not long now, my precious. You'll be safe in my arms soon!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: And what do we have here? A secret materia vault perhaps?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text:
Initiating mako energy saturation.
Deploying security grate.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Now we're cookin'! I'm comin', materia, ready or not!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: You remember what Nayo said? About helping us?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: That it was "necessary for building a brighter future"? What did she mean?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Well...you know how it is between Wutai and Avalanche. We're never gonna see eye-to-eye.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: And we're bound to come up against each other someday.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: But, when we do, the fact they worked with us might help both parties put their differences aside and avoid a conflict.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: That's what I got out of it anyway.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Before you got here, I did a little bit of recon.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Found out what they want. Free elections, workers' rights, fair distribution of wealth...
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: They don't see the world how we see it.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: And when you look at the world, what is it that you see?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Homes bombed to dust...plumes of gunsmoke...people pleading...bloodshed.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Quit holdin' out on us, Shinra! We're here for materia, not these dorks!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Welcome to our state-of-the-art weapons testing facility.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: This is where we push every piece of ordnance to its limits...and beyond.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Such tests are an invaluable part of the development process.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Go on, see where the magic happens.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Select ordnance type to deploy for this trial.
data.speaker: Research Program

data.text: Selection confirmed. Initiating ordnance deployment procedure.
data.speaker: Research Program

data.text: Select ordnance type to deploy for this trial.
data.speaker: Research Program

data.text: Seems I may have underestimated how resilient you ninjas can be.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: You Wutaians, so feisty. But let's see how you fare against what I have in store for you next.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: It's quite the treat, I assure you. Only the best for our honored guests, after all.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: What are you waiting for? Better hurry.
data.speaker: Scarlet

data.text: Man, I so don't wanna go back out there...but I don't think we've got a choice.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Where are these freaks even coming from!? 'Cause I'd really like 'em to stop!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Joke's on you, Shinra, if you think we're dying in this ugly box!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: There's gotta be a projection mechanism around here somewhere.
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: If we can just find it...
data.speaker: Sonon

data.text: Now can we please get outta here already?
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: I don't like the looks of this... I doubt they're here to help.
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text:
Go to which floor?
Currently on B15 (Production)

Go to which floor?
Currently on B14 (Maintenance)

Go to which floor?
Currently on B15 (Production)

Go to which floor?
Currently on B14 (Maintenance)

Go to which floor?
Currently on B13 (Development)
Access granted. Occupancy limited to one subject. Proceed to gate to begin training exercise.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Training? Really? Just give us what we came for already!
data.speaker: Yuffie

data.text: Select a training program to run.
Might still be worth a shot. Could be something in it for us. Just...be careful, 'kay?
data.speaker: Sonon
